hero.title: Your Hands Protected
hero.description: With over 40 years' experience in designing, manufacturing and distributing safety gloves, we developed tailored solutions for hand protection for heavy duty industries, with particular focus on heat and cut hazards.

productsHero.description: The right PPE is a critical line of defence that protects workers from hazards, prevents injuries, and saves lives. Research shows that effective PPE usage can reduce workplace injury rates by up to 60%, underscoring how crucial the right equipment is to a safer, more productive work environment. Poorly fitted or inadequate PPE, on the other hand, is demonstrated to be a concurring factor to the majority of registered injuries.
productsHero.secondDescription: With over 40 years of industry expertise, we specialise in designing and distributing top-quality products that meet rigorous industry standards, ensuring the perfect fit and protection tailored to your unique challenges. We offer comprehensive head-to-toe safety solutions with particular expertise in hand protection.

protection.title: Protection
protection.description: Safety is our core objective and every product we design starts with protecting people

comfort.title: Comfort
comfort.description: From material selection to task-specific customisation, we make our product fit the operators' needs, not the opposite.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Consistent quality is ensured by stringent checks and certified production chain to ensure compliance.

affordability.title: Affordability
affordability.description: Meticulous production planning and strong international partnerships allow us to offer our quality products at competitive price.

glovesHero.description: Discover our comprehensive range of high-performance safety gloves, designed to provide superior protection against heat, cuts, and mechanical hazards in industrial environments.

industriesHero.description: Discover how Hand Line's innovative safety solutions are tailored to meet the unique challenges of various industries, providing protection and performance when it matters most.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: With over four decades of experience, Hand Line Company has established itself as a leader in innovative hand protection solutions for industrial environments.

heatProtection.title: Heat Protection Gloves
heatProtection.description: Our bread and butter. We design and manufacture gloves to cater for all environments and temperatures, exceeding 1000C

cutResistance.title: Cut Resistant Gloves
cutResistance.description: Advanced materials provide superior cut protection while maintaining dexterity and comfort for precision tasks.

customisation.title: Product Customisation
customisation.description: We design and tailor products with our customers, starting from the operator's needs. We combine our deep expertise with your input to build the perfect solution.

headToToe.title: Head-to-toe Protection
headToToe.description: We provide full-range safety solutions, both with first party products and partnering with industry leading brands. We offer complete protection at the best prices.

quote.text: My journey began 40 years ago when I observed workers handling hot moulds. By combining their perspectives with my craftsmanship, we created innovative safety solutions that now protect workers across countless industries.
quote.author: Franco Castronuovo, CEO and Founder

industrySolutions.description: We design specialised hand protection for a wide range of industries, ensuring safety, comfort, and precision for every application.
industrySolutions.detailedDescription: We start from the person and design solutions around their needs. With almost half a century serving large organisations, we've developed deep industry expertise to help our customers improve protection and optimise productivity.

main.title: Product Categories
main.description: Explore our comprehensive range of industrial safety products designed to protect workers across various industries.

gloves.title: Safety Gloves
gloves.description: High-performance protective gloves for all industrial applications
gloves.categoriesDescription: Choose from our specialised range of safety gloves designed for specific industrial applications.
gloves.detailedDescription: Our comprehensive range of safety gloves provides superior protection across all industrial applications. From extreme heat resistance to advanced cut protection, our gloves are designed with precision engineering and tested to exceed industry standards. Each category is specifically tailored to meet the unique challenges of different work environments while maintaining comfort and dexterity.

heat.title: Heat-Resistant Gloves
heat.description: Advanced thermal protection for high-temperature environments up to 350°C

mechanical.title: Mechanical Hazards Gloves
mechanical.description: Superior protection against mechanical risks and general workplace hazards

cut.title: Cut-Resistant Gloves
cut.description: Superior protection against cuts and lacerations with Level 5 resistance

general.title: General Use Gloves
general.description: Versatile protection for everyday industrial tasks and construction work

welding.title: Welding Gloves
welding.description: Specialised protection for welding and high-heat metalworking tasks

industrialSwabs.title: Industrial Swabs
industrialSwabs.description: Specialised cleaning and maintenance solutions for industrial environments
industrialSwabs.detailedDescription: Our industrial swabs provide specialised cleaning and maintenance solutions for demanding industrial environments. Designed for precision cleaning tasks, these high-quality swabs are essential for electronics manufacturing, automotive assembly, aerospace applications, and general industrial maintenance where cleanliness and precision are critical.

respiratory.title: Respiratory Protection
respiratory.description: Advanced respiratory protection equipment for hazardous environments
respiratory.detailedDescription: Our respiratory protection equipment provides advanced protection against airborne hazards in industrial environments. From dust masks to full-face respirators, our products are designed to meet the highest safety standards whilst ensuring comfort during extended use. Essential for construction, manufacturing, chemical processing, and any environment with airborne contaminants.

heat.title: Heat-Resistant Products
heat.description: Browse our complete range of heat-resistant gloves designed for extreme temperature protection.
heat.detailedDescription: Our heat-resistant gloves provide exceptional thermal protection for workers in high-temperature environments. Engineered with advanced materials and tested to withstand temperatures up to 350°C, these gloves offer superior protection without compromising dexterity. Perfect for glass manufacturing, metalworking, welding, and other high-heat industrial applications.

cut.title: Cut-Resistant Products
cut.description: Browse our complete range of cut-resistant gloves designed for maximum protection against sharp objects.
cut.detailedDescription: Our cut-resistant gloves provide superior protection against cuts and lacerations whilst maintaining exceptional dexterity and comfort. Engineered with advanced materials and tested to achieve Level 5 cut resistance, these gloves are essential for workers handling sharp materials, glass, metal fabrication, and precision assembly operations.

general.title: General Purpose Products
general.description: Browse our complete range of general purpose gloves designed for everyday industrial tasks.
general.detailedDescription: Our general purpose gloves provide reliable protection for everyday industrial tasks and construction work. Designed for versatility and comfort, these gloves offer excellent grip, durability, and protection for a wide range of applications including assembly work, material handling, maintenance tasks, and general construction activities.

mechanical.title: Mechanical Hazards Products
mechanical.description: Browse our complete range of mechanical hazards gloves designed for superior workplace protection.
mechanical.detailedDescription: Our mechanical hazards gloves provide superior protection against mechanical risks and general workplace hazards whilst maintaining exceptional dexterity and comfort. Engineered with advanced materials and tested to meet EN388 standards, these gloves are essential for workers in manufacturing, assembly, construction, and general industrial environments.

welding.title: Welding Products
welding.description: Browse our complete range of welding gloves designed for high-heat metalworking tasks.
welding.detailedDescription: Our welding gloves provide specialised protection for welding and high-heat metalworking tasks with superior durability and comfort. Engineered with heat-resistant materials and designed for demanding welding environments, these gloves offer excellent protection against sparks, spatter, and high temperatures whilst maintaining the dexterity needed for precision work.

respiratory.title: Respiratory Protection Products
respiratory.description: Browse our complete range of respiratory protection equipment for hazardous environments.

industrialSwabs.detailedDescription: Explore our range of specialised cleaning solutions designed for industrial applications.

about.heading: About
about.description: For over four decades, Hand Line has been at the forefront of industrial safety, designing and manufacturing premium protective gloves that combine innovation, comfort, and uncompromising protection.

hero.title: We protect the
hero.subtitle: We believe "Zero Accident" is more than a vision, it's a need.
hero.descriptionMobile: We envision a world where every organisation equips its workforce with custom-engineered equipment, meticulously designed to address the unique requirements of their employees.
hero.descriptionDesktop: We strive to be the catalyst for a safer and more comfortable workplace, where businesses prioritise individual well-being and productivity through personalised protection solutions, ultimately setting new standards for safety and comfort in the industrial sector.

history.heading: Our History
history.description: From our beginnings in Milan to becoming a leading safety equipment manufacturer, discover key moments that shaped our company.

1977.title: Foundation
1977.description: Our history starts as Italian manufacturer of leather and work gloves with a distinctively artisanal footprint based on craftsmanship and high quality products

1980.title: First Innovation
1980.description: We develop the first wool mitten for high-temperature mould handling in the hot end of the glass manufacturing process

1996.title: Standards Certification
1996.description: We led the way in adapting to newly introduced EN388 and EN407 standards bringing certified products to all our customers. Our products are widely adopted across major glass manufacturing and automotive plants in Italy

2002.title: Portfolio Expansion
2002.description: We enlarge our product portfolio dedicated to the glass and metallurgy industries with many gloves certified over 350°C. Our geographical expansion starts across 6 markets in Europe and Middle East, driven by our existing Italian customers.

2003.title: Company Incorporation
2003.description: Hand Line Company is incorporated, marking the shift from artisanal firm into business enterprise that has flourished, has won credibility, and inspired confidence to a wider number of clients. We supply gloves and other PPE across 10 markets in Europe and the East

2005.title: Extreme Heat Innovation
2005.description: We develop and certify a unique glove able to withstand over 1,000°C contact heat for extreme conditions: HL 1000

2015.title: Digital Transformation
2015.description: Hand Line embarks in its digitalisation of processes and marks the change with a brand re-design

2023.title: Infrastructure Expansion
2023.description: We invest in a significant expansion of our HQ and Warehouse in northern Italy, driven by increased portfolio of customers and international footprint

2025.title: UK Market Entry
2025.description: Hand Line announces its expansion in the UK market with the launch of a subsidiary in London to further support the growing market in England, Wales and Ireland

different.heading: What Makes Us Different
different.description: At Hand Line, we pride ourselves on several key differentiators that set us apart in the safety equipment industry.

productQuality.title: Excellence in
productQuality.description: 40+ years of technical expertise in safety glove manufacturing with rigorous quality control throughout production.

customisation.title: Unmatched
customisation.description: Tailored products according to user's needs. No one knows products better than our customer.

pricing.title: Competitive
pricing.description: Guaranteed market competitiveness and effective cost structure management.

innovation.title: Continuous
innovation.description: At the forefront of product development, continuously looking for new ways to improve.

flexibility.title: Product
flexibility.description: No order limits or restrictions, guaranteeing full flexibility to manage unpredictable needs.

service.title: Best in class
service.description: Stock management to cover fast changing customer's need, ensuring excellent delivery timing.

mission.heading: Protecting Hands That Build Our World
mission.description: Since 1981, Hand Line has been dedicated to developing innovative protective solutions that combine uncompromising safety with Italian design excellence.

points.0: Specialised manufacturing expertise in high-performance safety gloves
points.1: Rigorous testing to exceed industry safety standards
points.2: Balance of protection, comfort and performance
points.3: Commitment to innovation and continuous improvement

values.heading: Principles That Guide Us
values.description: These core principles guide everything we do at Hand Line, from product design to customer service.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: We believe that safety should never be compromised. Every product we design prioritises protection above all else.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously push the boundaries of what is possible in hand protection through research and innovation.

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: We listen to our clients' needs and develop solutions that address their specific safety challenges.

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: Our rigorous quality control ensures that every product meets the highest standards of durability and performance.

design.title: Design Clarity
design.description: We believe in clear, purposeful design that enhances function while providing intuitive user experience.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Our products meet or exceed all relevant safety standards and certifications across global markets.

team.heading: Meet the Hand Line Team
team.description: Our dedicated professionals combine decades of experience with a passion for safety innovation.

certifications.heading: Our Commitments
certifications.description: Hand Line meets and exceeds the highest safety and quality standards in the industry, ensuring reliable protection for all users.
certifications.mainStatement: Our production follows the highest quality standards with ISO certification across production and value chain.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Our production follows the highest quality standards with ISO certification.

compliance.title: Compliance

environmental.title: Environmental Commitment
environmental.description: Our commitment to help our planet through sustainable practices and responsible manufacturing.

certifications.note: Our certification documentation is available upon request.

hero.title: We protect the Hands that build our World.
hero.description: Our mission goes beyond providing world-class Personal Protective Equipment. We believe true protection includes a responsibility to the environment, to society, and to ethical governance. That's why we are actively aligning our operations with ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) principles.

environmental.title: Environmental Stewardship
environmental.description: We are taking meaningful steps to reduce our environmental footprint:

points.0: Transitioning to sustainable materials and eco-friendly packaging.
points.1: Reducing waste through lean manufacturing and recycling programmes.
points.2: Minimising carbon emissions across our supply chain and logistics.

environmental.closing: While our ESG journey has just begun, sustainability is no longer optional—it's essential.

social.title: Social Responsibility
social.description: Our commitment to people drives everything we do:

points.0: We prioritise worker safety and fair labour practices across our global supply chain.
points.1: We are building strong relationships with our local communities through education, donations, and volunteer programmes.
points.2: Internally, we foster a culture of diversity, equity, and inclusion, ensuring a safe and respectful workplace.

points.0: We're implementing clear, accountable policies that ensure ethical business practices.
points.1: Our leadership is focused on long-term impact, not just short-term profit.
points.2: We are increasing transparency by tracking and reporting ESG metrics across our operations.

certification.title: Our Path to Certification
certification.description: We are in the initial phases of ESG certification preparation and working with recognised frameworks, we are:
certification.closing: This is a long-term journey, and we're committed to real, measurable progress—not just box-checking.

cta.title: Let's Build a Safer, More Sustainable
cta.description: We invite our partners, customers, and community to join us in creating a more sustainable and ethical future in PPE. If you have questions about our ESG practices or want to collaborate, contact us here.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our safety gloves and services

questions.question: How do I choose the right PPE?
questions.answer: Selecting the right PPE is crucial to ensure the safety and wellbeing of your employees. Firstly, we recommend gathering detailed information of the working conditions and risk exposure in the most extreme conditions encountered. That will give an indication of the protection levels and practical requirements for the PPE. Our website includes a wide range of products that you can filter by requirements, environment conditions, risk category, or protection level. We always recommend contacting our team to discuss and recommend the most suitable PPE based on your work environment and required protection. We are just one click away.

questions.question: Are you able to customise and design bespoke PPE?
questions.answer: Yes, we can create tailored hand protection solutions based on your specific requirements. We have the capability of creating samples within weeks. Many of the products we offer today were initially created for our customers' specifications.

questions.question: Can I request product samples for testing?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer samples for industrial customers and distributors. Please contact us with your company details and application requirements to arrange a sample pack.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we currently supply PPE in over 15 market across EMEA and have the capability to deliver globally.

questions.question: What industries do you serve?
questions.answer: Our products are designed for a wide range of industries including glass manufacturing, metal production, construction, automotive, food processing, logistics, and metalworking. We have developed deep industry expertise in glass and metal manufacturing and heavy industry with over 40 years of experience serving large international customers. We are both a reliable supplier and a trusted advisor to our customers.

questions.question: Do you offer OEM or private label options?
questions.answer: Yes, we can support OEM and private label manufacturing for partners looking to customise gloves, garments, etc with their own branding, packaging, or specifications. Contact us to discuss your requirements.

questions.question: What standards do your product comply with?
questions.answer: All our products are certified according to European PPE Regulation (EU) 2016/425 and comply with relevant EN standards.

questions.question: How do I become a distributor or reseller of your products?
questions.answer: Please fill out our distributor application form or contact our team directly at distribution@handlineco.com. We support resellers with marketing materials, technical training, and flexible ordering options.

hero.title: Product
hero.description: Important information regarding the proper use, limitations, and care of Hand Line safety gloves and protective equipment. Understanding these guidelines is essential for maintaining optimal protection and performance.

usage.title: Product Usage Disclaimer
usage.content: Hand Line gloves and protective equipment are designed to provide protection in specific work environments when used correctly. Our products primarily focus on hand protection with specialised solutions for heat resistance, cut resistance, and general construction applications. Please read and understand all accompanying documentation before using any of our products.

heatResistance.title: Heat Resistance
heatResistance.content: Products that provide heat resistance or protection against heat are not intended for use in extreme temperatures - use only as specified. Hand Line heat-resistant gloves provide protection against momentary exposure to heat but will not protect against extreme temperatures, extended heat exposure, or submersion in hot liquids. The heat resistance rating indicates the product's capability under controlled testing conditions, which may differ from actual workplace conditions.

cutResistance.title: Cut Resistance
cutResistance.content: Products that provide 'cut resistance' and 'cut protection' do not completely prevent or eliminate the potential for cuts or punctures, and are not intended or tested to provide protection against powered blades, serrated or other sharp or rotating equipment. Cut resistance levels are based on standardised tests that may not reflect all workplace conditions or extreme forces.

generalGuidelines.title: General Guidelines
generalGuidelines.content: All Hand Line safety gloves and equipment must be inspected before each use. Do not use damaged items. Follow all care instructions to maintain the protective properties of the equipment. Different Hand Line products offer different types and levels of protection - always select the appropriate product for your specific task.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.content: No personal protective equipment can provide complete protection against all hazards. Our gloves and other protective equipment are tested to specific standards and are designed to protect against designated risks only. Products that provide protection against sparks or flame are not 'fire-proof' and do not completely prevent or eliminate the potential for burns or associated injuries.

properSelection.title: Proper Selection
properSelection.content: It is the responsibility of the employer and user to assess the type of hazard and select the appropriate protective equipment. Hand Line offers a range of specialised gloves for different applications including heat-proof, cut-proof, construction, and general industrial use. Consult industry professionals if uncertain about the suitability of a product for your specific environment.

modification.title: Modification
modification.content: Any modification to Hand Line gloves or equipment voids all certification and warranty claims. Products should be used only as designed and intended. Alterations may compromise the protective properties and could result in injury.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.content: Users are encouraged to always use caution and care when handling sharp or abrasive materials, chemicals, or other hazardous or dangerous substances. Any information or data provided is based upon Hand Line's current knowledge and understanding of the subject matter, and is offered solely as a possible suggestion for use in making your own decisions or product choices. Product users should conduct all appropriate testing or other evaluations to determine the suitability of Hand Line products for a particular purpose or use within a particular environment. Hand Line may revise this information as new information, knowledge or experience becomes available. According to current regulations, the employer has the final responsibility for selecting gloves and other personal protective equipment.

hero.title: Compliance
